reviewText: Superb drama about a little boy whose COURAGE inspires his teacher to be the best he can be and follow your heart!

I returned this dvd because the English subtitles were on top of the Asian subtitles, and it was very difficult to read.  I am not Korean and don't understand the language, but I love Korean movies and subtitles.  If this can be fixed, it would be great--the story is great.  Sorry for the low rating.
